com.bixlabs.bkotlin

Class AtomicFileKt

  • com.bixlabs.bkotlin.AtomicFileKt

  • public class AtomicFileKt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] readBytes(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver)
      Gets the entire content of this file as a byte array.
      static java.lang.String readText(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Gets the entire content of this file as a String using UTF-8 or specified charset.
      static void tryWrite(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.io.FileOutputStream,kotlin.Unit> block)
      Perform the write operations inside block on this file. If block throws an exception the write will be failed. Otherwise the write will be applied atomically to the file.
      static void writeBytes(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver, byte[] array)
      Sets the content of this file as an array of bytes.
      static void writeText(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver, java.lang.String text, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Sets the content of this file as text encoded using UTF-8 or specified charset. If this file exists, it becomes overwritten.

    • Method Detail

      • tryWrite

        public static void tryWrite(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver,
                            kotlin.jvm.functions.Function1<? super java.io.FileOutputStream,kotlin.Unit> block)

        Perform the write operations inside block on this file. If block throws an exception the write will be failed. Otherwise the write will be applied atomically to the file.

      • writeBytes

        public static void writeBytes(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver,
                              byte[] array)

        Sets the content of this file as an array of bytes.

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver,
                             java.lang.String text,
                             java.nio.charset.Charset charset)

        Sets the content of this file as text encoded using UTF-8 or specified charset. If this file exists, it becomes overwritten.

      • readBytes

        public static byte[] readBytes(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver)

        Gets the entire content of this file as a byte array.

        This method is not recommended on huge files. It has an internal limitation of 2 GB file size.

      • readText

        public static java.lang.String readText(android.util.AtomicFile $receiver,
                                        java.nio.charset.Charset charset)

        Gets the entire content of this file as a String using UTF-8 or specified charset.

        This method is not recommended on huge files. It has an internal limitation of 2 GB file size.
